rows.label: qst002312_msg0001
rows.name:
Master Sephrian's preachings are
always so inspiring.

rows.label: qst002312_msg0002
rows.name: I'm glad I came all this way to listen.

rows.label: qst002312_msg0003
rows.name:
I...I think I can feel tears welling
up in my eyes...

rows.label: qst002312_msg0101
rows.name:
Did you know, Master Sephrian
apparently committed some kind
of terrible sin earlier in his life?

rows.label: qst002312_msg0102
rows.name: But his soul was saved by faith.

rows.label: qst002312_msg0103
rows.name:
I hope he can save the soul of
that Nopon, too.
